description: Variation of condition 2 of planning application ref: 2013/00915/FUL allowed on Appeal ref: APP/H5390/A/13/2208376 granted 25th March 2014 for the 'Erection of an additional floor at roof level in connection with the creation of 2 no. self contained flats (1 x 1 bedroom flat and 1 x 2 bedroom flat), including relocation of existing water tank, formation of 2 no. roof terraces and erection of balustrades around perimeter of existing roof to provide maintenance access', varied by application ref. 2016/03003/VAR for the increase in the height of 140mm above the consented scheme; removal of proposed planters at roof level; replacement of glazed clerestorey with opaque glass around roof perimeter; and introduction of flat rooflights. Amendments to include installation of internal ventilation and cooling fans with 2no air intake vents, 3no heat recovery extractor fans 4no flush grilles to accommodate 4no internal air conditioning units to Unit 2 at fourth floor level.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
